Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery ostracon, the fabric is relatively coarse, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394961) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394961)
